Mind: Could not articulate for some time on awaking
FEELING AS IF A PART OF THE BODY WERE ABSENT
Chest: Pain under left nipple, and aching in right breast
Pain through to scapula from region of left breast
Full, bursting feeling, as if from obstruction at heart
Extremities: Skin sensitive, rubbing of trousers causes an acute sting
Legs and arms feel heavy and sore

name: Cotyledon
Relationship: Compare: AMBRA; ASA.; HEPATICA; IGNATIA; LACHES.
details: Marked action on heart; oppression of chest; fullness in throat. Epilepsy. Numb aching in muscular and fibrous tissue. Sciatica. Well-marked pains through the breast to scapula. Catarrh of larynx and trachea. Hysterical joint.
